item.description:
******ATTENTION*****
****EVENT MOVED TO THURSDAY DUE TO WEATHER****


I thought it would be nice to have a Halloween get together for the group. You can dress yourself and/ or your dog up or not. I'll be bringing fresh cold New Hampshire water for the pups and fresh hot New Hampshire apple cider for the humans. I"ll be bringing homemade treats for the pups and some recipes for the humans. Hence, the treats. I thought it might be nice if anyone else makes homemade dog treats they could bring some along as well as the recipes to share. Just a thought, and again, if this doesn't work for you then just come by and play some ball and enjoy some cider. It should be fun. See you at the Park. "WOOF"

I changed the time on this meetup, I know its hard for alot of us to get to the park by 5 or so. So just come when you can. Darkness in the northern woods comes early these days.

Also.... after Benedictine Park, we are going to T-bones in Bedford or Cactus Jack's in Manchester (per Liz's most excellent suggestion) as they will donate $5 to the Animal Rescue league and give you a $5 gift certificate towards your next visit; a win-win donation! [ certificate rules ]
Don't hesitate to pipe in with your restaurant preference.

We will also be making our selections from the Pet Edge catalogue Liz gave us 2 weeks ago so we can make one larger order and save on shipping. So bring your catalog wish list, check book and mad money for dinner !!
item.how_to_find_us: At the Picnic table towards the back of the park.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Trick & then a Treat Evening at The Park.
